name: protean
effect:
Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses.

The type change takes place just before the move is used.
short_effect: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
Changes the Pokémon’s type to
the type of the move it’s using.

flavor_text_entries.scarlet-violet: Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's about to use. This works only once each time the Pokémon enters battle.
